title: Microsoft Gahan Wilson's the ultimate haunted house (MAC)
brief_description: Race against the clock to escape a creepy, spooky haunted house that changes every time you play. Designed by Gahan Wilson, “The Ultimate haunted house” has easy to access game help, and loads of eerie sound effects to make playing fun for monster lovers aged 8 and up. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Macintosh LC III or higher; system 7.0 or later; QuickTime 1.6.1 or later; 8 mb total RAM (or 5 Mb free RAM); double-speed CD-ROM drive; 13” or larger colour monitor.
